item.title: NZ deputy mayor apologises for calling member of the public a 'nonce'
item.description: Wellington, New Zealand deputy mayor Ben McNulty has apologised for calling a member of the public a "nonce".

item.title: US politicians hear option of not selling Australia nuclear submarines
item.description: An option of the United States reneging on the AUSUS deal has been put to powerful legislators.

item.title: Melania pulled from cinema over joke made on marquee
item.description: Film studio Amazon MGM has pulled the documentary Melania from being screened at a cinema in the US after it was wryly mocked on the marquee.

item.title: Office vacancy rates in Melbourne surge to 30-year high ahead of looming work-from-home legislation
item.description: Office vacancy in Melbourne jumped to 19.1 per cent in January this year, up from 17.9 per cent in July 2025 – the worst occupancy rate in Australia.

item.title: Vasectomies in Australia spike by more than 60 per cent as cost of living bites
item.description: A new study out of Adelaide University has revealed the number of vasectomies has spiked by more than 60 per cent.

item.title: Bunnings wins the right to use facial recognition CCTV in stores
item.description: The technology is intended to protect staff and customers from violence, abuse and crime.

item.title: New data suggests number of Australians living with dementia set to rise
item.description: This figure is projected to more than double by 2065.

item.title: Hope out of tragedy as Bondi Junction mass stabbing lessons laid bare

item.title: Man accused of mimicking Bondi attack to remain behind bars

item.title: UK leader apologises to Epstein victims for giving Peter Mandelson ambassadorial job

item.title: Angelic face of Italian prime minister Giorgia Meloni wiped from church fresco

item.description: Seven years after its launch, video game Fallout 76 continues to evolve, with new updates shaped by both fan feedback and inspiration from Amazon's Fallout TV series.

item.description: The New START treaty is the last nuclear pact between Russia and the US, and it expires today.
